introText: This daily digest covers updates on Apple hardware and software, and AI/technology platforms; startup funding and tech business deals; autonomous mobility and transportation; health tech and regulatory developments; global politics and policy; European and Dutch news; culture and entertainment; energy and climate news; security and legal matters; and sports.

categories.commentary: Updates on Apple devices, operating systems, chargers, and ecosystem services.

articles.title: The Apple Watch SE 3 is the one to buy
articles.summary: Verge says the Apple Watch SE 3 offers strong value with improved efficiency and longer battery life, running watchOS 26; suitable for first-time buyers and budget-conscious shoppers.

articles.title: Apple Watch hypertension alerts cleared by FDA for new and old watches
articles.summary: FDA clearance extends hypertension alerts to older and newer Apple Watch models, enabling monitoring of blood pressure trends and flagging potential hypertension as part of Apple’s health signals strategy.

articles.title: Apple’s new iPhone charger is a (second) of its kind
articles.summary: Article explains USB-C PD 3.2 charging approach, device compatibility, and potential improvements in charging speeds within Apple’s ecosystem.

articles.title: AirPods Pro 3 review: tripling down on a good thing
articles.summary: AirPods Pro 3 offer improved sound, fit, noise cancellation, and live translation, with better battery life and call quality.

articles.title: iOS 26 with Apple’s Liquid Glass redesign is out now
articles.summary: iOS 26 launches with Liquid Glass redesign; describes navigation changes, feature updates, and initial performance impressions.

articles.title: Apple Vision Pro gains support for digital prism correction
articles.summary: Vision Pro now allows software-based prism correction by entering prism values in settings, improving comfort for users with prism prescriptions.

articles.title: Apple’s Wallet app has key new feature for saved credit cards in iOS 26
articles.summary: iOS 26 expands how saved cards work in Wallet, enabling broader use across apps and stores and tightening integration with Apple services.

articles.title: Almost a week in, the iPhone Air doesn’t look like a pre-order hit
articles.summary: Delivery estimates show iPhone Air largely available at launch, with some variants experiencing longer waits due to allocation.

articles.title: Review: Apple Watch Ultra 3 delivers off-grid connectivity as Series 11 extends battery
articles.summary: Ultra 3 highlights off-grid satellite connectivity and longer battery life tied to Series 11 improvements.

categories.commentary: News on platforms, AI, software tooling, and how digital services are evolving.

articles.title: YouTube is inching closer to becoming a shopping channel
articles.summary: YouTube adds monetization tools including AI-assisted tagging and dynamic ads to boost product discovery and creator earnings.

articles.title: Gemini tops the App Store thanks to new AI image model, Nano Banana
articles.summary: Gemini’s Nano Banana AI image model boosts app performance and engagement on the App Store.

articles.title: Google rolls out new Windows desktop app with Spotlight-like search tool
articles.summary: Google launches a Windows desktop app with a Spotlight-inspired search experience integrating Google services.

articles.title: CodeRabbit raises $60M, valuing the 2-year-old AI code review startup at $550M
articles.summary: CodeRabbit raises $60 million at a $550 million valuation to expand its AI-driven code review platform.

articles.title: D-ID acquires Berlin-based video startup Simpleshow
articles.summary: D-ID acquires Simpleshow to broaden its AI-powered video capabilities and product integration.

articles.title: Robinhood plans to launch a startups fund open to all retail investors
articles.summary: Robinhood plans a startup fund accessible to all retail investors to participate in early-stage funding.

articles.title: The 9 most sought-after startups from YC Demo Day
articles.summary: TechCrunch profiles the nine startups deemed most attractive from YC Demo Day, highlighting traction and potential.

articles.title: Silicon Valley bets big on environments to train AI agents
articles.summary: Explores simulated environments and synthetic data used to train AI agents, enabling rapid iteration and safer testing.

articles.title: OpenAI will apply new restrictions to ChatGPT users under 18
articles.summary: OpenAI introduces age-based restrictions on ChatGPT usage for users under 18 for safety and compliance.

articles.title: Al Gore on China’s climate rise: ‘I would not have seen this coming’
articles.summary: Al Gore discusses shifts in China’s climate landscape and implications for global energy policy.

categories.commentary: News about self-driving tech, airport mobility, and related regulatory milestones.

articles.title: Waymo gets green light for airport service in San Francisco
articles.summary: Waymo receives permit to operate robotaxi service at San Francisco International Airport, with designated terminals and safety requirements.

categories.commentary: Updates on health tech, disease prevention, and safety standards.

articles.title: Apple Watch hypertension alerts cleared by FDA for new and old watches
articles.summary: FDA clearance extends hypertension alerts to older and newer Apple Watch models, enabling health trend monitoring.

articles.title: Denmark close to wiping out cancer-causing HPV strains after vaccine roll-out

articles.title: OpenAI restrictions to ChatGPT users under 18
articles.summary: OpenAI imposes age-based restrictions on under-18 usage to improve safety and compliance.

categories.commentary: Coverage of domestic politics, international diplomacy, and policy developments.

articles.title: Trump Invokes Kirk’s Killing in Justifying Measures to Silence Opponents
articles.summary: Trump and allies push policy measures targeting perceived opponents amid controversial events surrounding Charlie Kirk.

articles.title: Suspect Faces Aggravated Murder Charge, and Death Penalty
articles.summary: Live coverage indicates the suspect faces aggravated murder charges and possible death penalty in the Kirk shooting case.

articles.title: Obama Says the Nation Is in a ‘Political Crisis’
articles.summary: Obama warns of polarization and democratic norms erosion, calling for civic engagement and common ground.

articles.title: Bondi Prompts Broad Backlash After Saying She’ll Target ‘Hate Speech’
articles.summary: Backlash over AG’s pledge to target hate speech and concerns about civil liberties.

articles.title: Kash Patel Plays the Familiar Role of Pugilist at a Senate Hearing
articles.summary: Kash Patel adopts a combative stance during a Senate hearing on FBI-national security matters.

articles.title: Democrats Oppose Stopgap Bill, Raising Odds of a Shutdown

articles.title: Openbaar Ministerie eist 14 jaar en tbs na doden en wegmaken lichaam sekswerker
articles.summary: Public Prosecutor seeks 14 years and compulsory treatment in a case involving homicide and disposal of a sex worker’s body.

articles.title: Celstraf van zes maanden voor Palestijnse Mahmoud A., die Israëlische Maccabi-supporter mishandelde
articles.summary: Palestinian Mahmoud A. sentenced to six months for assaulting an Israeli Maccabi supporter; reduced responsibility due to trauma and intellectual disability.

categories.commentary: news on energy policy, climate issues and environmental topics.

articles.title: Von der Leyen wil uitfaseren Russische olie- en gasimport versnellen na gesprek met Trump
articles.summary: EU aims to speed up phasing out Russian oil and gas imports following talks with Trump; targets include stopping Russian gas contracts by Jan 1, 2026 and ending Russian oil imports by end of 2027.
